Hi! I'm Feng Tian, Faculty at School of Remote Sensing and Information Engineering, Wuhan University. I do research with Earth observation data and mainly interested in vegetation dynamics and interaction with environments and human activities.

### Education

[University of Copenhagen](https://ign.ku.dk/english/) \| Denmark

*PhD in Physical Geography \| September 2013 - September 2016*

**China University of Mining & Technology** \| Xuzhou, China

*Successive Master and PhD student in Remote Sensing \| September 2010 - May 2013*

**Inner Mongolia Agriculture University** \| Hohhot, China

*B.S. in Surveying and Mapping Engineering \| August 2006 - July 2010*
